Once a client's term has expired or has been terminated, then WaitWell Inc. will no longer retain the client data nor any personal information.
WaitWell Inc. operates the following websites covered under this Privacy Policy:

WaitWell Inc. will only retain client data for as long as needed.
This means that we will retain client data for as long as the client has a current and active account with WaitWell Inc.
The Credit Card information is not stored by WaitWell Inc., but instead is only used by the Secure Payment Gateway.
We may collect information that your browser sends whenever you visit our website ("Log Data").
Once a client's term has expired or has been terminated, then WaitWell Inc. will no longer retain the client data nor any personal information.
